attributes.action: Stop Sefton Council from closing the Aviary, Fernery and Nursery Shop at Botanic Gardens and the Conservatory at Hesketh Park in Southport
attributes.additional_details:
Sefton Council have proposed that for cost saving purposes they will consider the closure of the Aviary, Fernery and Nursery Shop at Botanic Gardens and the Conservatory at Hesketh Park in Southport.

This is a petition against the proposal and by signing it you are requesting that these facilities continue to be available to the public and remain open.

Sign to save our beautiful parks! We need as many signatures as we can to make our council understand that this action is not acceptable.

Sefton Council will make the decision March 1st 2012, so please ensure you sign prior to this date and spread the word to other people who may be affected!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Council.
